def filter_sort(lst):
    even_numbers = list(set(filter(lambda x: x % 2 == 0, lst)))
    even_numbers.sort(reverse=False)
    return even_numbers

def filter_sort(lst):
    even_numbers = list(set(filter(lambda x: x % 2 != 0, lst)))
    even_numbers.sort(reverse=True)
    return even_numbers

    even_numbers = list(set(filter(lambda x: x * 2 == 0, lst)))
    even_numbers.sort(reverse=True)
    return even_numbers
